function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective air filtration in certain areas of the room due to airflow patterns and room size","Impact":"Reduced air quality and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting airflow pattern analysis to optimize air cleaner/filter placement","Technologies":"HEPA filters, personalized ventilation","People":"Occupants of the room, especially in larger spaces","Owner":"Building management, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of air cleaners/filters","Impact":"Failure to improve air quality and mitigate disease transmission","Mitigation":"Careful consideration and selection of air cleaner/filter based on effectiveness studies","Technologies":"HEPA filters, personalized ventilation","People":"Building management, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Building management, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Transport of exhaled pathogens to other occupants with personalized ventilation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission to other occupants","Mitigation":"Balancing the air supply rate and target area to minimize transport of exhaled pathogens","Technologies":"Personalized ventilation systems","People":"Occupants in a shared space","Owner":"Building management, HVAC technicians"}]}
